website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's wire-free Galaxy Buds earphones deliver fantastic audio performance for a reasonable price, which is enough to overcome some dubious marketing claims.
pros: Excellent audio performance with rich, full bass and bright, well-defined highs
Solid mic intelligibility in quiet spaces
cons: Poor mic intelligibility in loud scenarios

customer_reviews.title: Banging Buds
customer_reviews.text: I've read a lot of negative reviews on Samsung's new buds..! But completely unjustified in my opinion. These sound great. Loads of bass & crystal clear, even at max volume. If you have a Samsung phone the features are brilliant. Tap controls are spot on & there so small. The most comfortable earphones I've ever had. For the money I can't fault these in anyway. Absolutely no point in comparing to Bose and other top makes that cost far more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: All round great ear buds
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was pretty quick, very impressed with this item, it ticks every box if you are a gym goer 😁. I've had a few wireless headphones an have always had issues with them falling out an how uncomfortablw/irritating they can be, these throughout the hour an a half training was comfortable an even training on the heavy bag they didn't feel at any point that they was going to fall out, as for the sound, they are pretty decent, they have an ok amount of bass to them which is good enough for me anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Einie D

customer_reviews.title: It's all about the bass !!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday as promised, easy to use and easy to fit, great design and fit in the ears comfortably I would say these are perfect in every way, the range is fantastic and the look and feel is spot on, great design. BUT......there is almost no bass ! These AKG people are basscists !! I mean WTAF! mids and trebbles are clear as a bell but the lack of bass is deafening.
customer_reviews.author: ADS_RX7

customer_reviews.title: Opinion of someone who has never had wireless earbuds...
customer_reviews.text: It really is small and not just the case, sound quality is good aswell. But it takes like 15 seconds for your galaxy device to recognize your earbuds when opening the case. Shaped like a giant pill btw. I think i might have forgotten to tell something but, eh, its good in general.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful what u purchase through JB INTL Ltd
customer_reviews.text: Bought these buds for my husband, for an anniversary present. To find that one of them stopped working. To cut a long story short these buds were out of warranty as they are from Uruguay!!!!!! So out of eu. Which means if they are out of eu i cant get a replacement or get them fixed. If i knew that these buds were from Uruguay. No way would i have purchased them. Thanks JB INTL for conning me! In process through Amazon to getting a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie P J  Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Fake or refurbished
customer_reviews.text: The headphones that I received seem to be fake, the box wasn't sealed and the lid doesn't fit like genuine Samsung genuine headphone. Also the ear pieces were covered in dust, so were either returned/refurbished or are fake
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Samsung offer Fake DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: They advertise the Samsung offer but are not qualified to do so. 3rd party do not qualify. This is direct from Samsung. Despite them promoting offer on their page.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L

customer_reviews.title: Dodgy - Not UK Version
customer_reviews.text: ONLY BRANDED supplier list these Samsung Buds as UK Version but they are not. They come with Italian instructions, no English instructions, and the model number is the Italian version (SM-R170NZWAITV). A sticker showing "UK Version" has been stuck over the top of the true sticker. This is illegal in this country, it is known in law as "passing off". The correct UK model number is SM-R170NZWABTU. Also the seal was broken when received. I doubt there is a valid Samsung warranty with these either. Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: DVJ Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little kit
customer_reviews.text: Loving it! Range is fab. I have bought some cheap ones and thought i'd invest. Glad made that decision. It is soo portable that i even leave it in my pocket all the time. You can use one or both buds. Battery life is good (could be better) Case has a nice feel to it. Automatically connects to samsung phone which i love. No more hassle of pairing. Comfortable that sometime i fall asleep wearing it. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: HonestReview

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed at the sound quality, but awesome features
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the sound quality to be better but I would say they are equivalent to most 20 quid wired earphones. The bass isn't that great and it can sound tinny at times. If you have a Samsung using Dolby Atmos really helps the quality and the Galaxy Wearables app offers more sound features. It stays firm in the ear and doesn't budge when active, it's also comfortable and you forget it's there after a while. The touchpads are responsive but I wish you didn't have to choose between a set configuration of what they do, and that they were fully customisable rather. Overall 3/5, I like the smart features but really let down on the sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Bilal

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many Bluetooth ear buds before (some quite expensive in comparison) and they all have flaws from rubbish sound quality, unpairing themselves through to keep falling out of my ears thus requiring me to wear a beeny hat in summer. These were supplied in every language apart from English. However my S7 Edge found them, paired instantly. The rubber inserts fitted as default (it comes with an assortment of sizes) fitted perfectly. The sound quality is close to my Bose Bluetooth over ear phones. The best by far I have heard.
customer_reviews.author: Walt B.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you expect to keep your phone in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: These buds fit well and have really good sound quality....when they work. However the connection quality is shocking and samsung are unable to repair it. Having spent hours back and forth to Samsung trying to get these to work while my phone is 2 feet away in my pocket the only conclusion has been to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Invisible buds
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how good they are, as I only received an empty box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawed firmware yet a great design
customer_reviews.text: Samsung.. how can you release a product with a major flaw? Put your phone in your pocket and the sound stutters on a regular basis. Put your phone in front of you and the headphones perform perfectly. Search the internet for "samsung buds stutter" for a workaround (change audio codec to AAC). It appears this problem affects only use with a Samsung phone (in my case a S7 edge) other that that the product design, form, comfort and sound are great. But unless you are willing to reset the codec EVERYTIME you use the headphones, I would avoid this product if you want to not have to hold your Samsung phone in your hand.. shameful!
customer_reviews.author: Peter jones

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not a patch on apple. Was expecting great things from all the online reviews, sad thing is however the sound quality was poor to say the least. I have since bought the apple in ear and the difference is amazing. And as someone who only ever buys samsung galaxy phones I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: steven joyner

customer_reviews.title: Great, convenient, works well.  Acceptable though not amazing sound.
customer_reviews.text: Really they're great. Great battery, never had any connection issues, they stay in your ears and are so comfy you forget you have them in. Sound quality is good. Not the best but perfectly fine for the size of these things. Better than my £35 wired Sennheisers but not by much, but these things are about convenience not quality. Although the quality isn't amazing, the sound is nicely balanced so that it's not overly bass boosted unlike a lot of other brands out there though there is a option for a bass boost equaliser in the app if you listen to a lot of EDM or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Sam butler

customer_reviews.title: Best value, branded earbuds right now.
customer_reviews.text: So these are my first true wireless ear buds and I have to say I love them! They're comfortable for couple of hours usage maybe more (not needed to use them longer so far). Sound quality is great, though I'm no audiophile, and paired with the Android app customisable. The touch sensors are responsive and easy to use. Mic is ok possibly a bit quiet and I haven't tried calls outside. Right now if bought direct from Amazon you can get £30 cashback from Samsung making these sub £100 earbuds. Just be sure to order from the right seller (Amazon not a 3rd party).
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: great for work/gym/home
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant true wireless earbuds with great sound quality after messing around with my phone's EQ. The battery life is horrible I use these while at work and on the bus the battery lasts until about 3pm for me after being used since 10:30/11 I use a xaiomi pocophone F1 works fine but sometimes get connection problems when my phone is in my inside jacket pocket it's very close so I don't understand how i can get interference? sometimes it cuts out a bit then acts normally kinda annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Has its cons and pros
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, the warranty support isnt as a great, had an issue with one earbud as no sound was coming out from it but after trying continiously for 2 weeks using the earbud as well it started working out of nowhere - samsung's warranty support is a hassle. The ambient sound isn't as great, with a higher volume you can't hear your surroundings which puts you at a very vulnerable place if you are cycling to work since it cancels any noise possible from outside - ambient sound works well on lower volume whatsoever well.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Gamechanger for music and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY IMPRESSED! simple to get them working by downloading the wearable app and the plugin app, they connect to my phone (huawei p30 pro) instantly as soon as the case opens, it works with my alexa app too MAJOR perk!, changing the settings around to my preferences within the app is fantastic and the sound is the best I've heard from any earphones or headset I've owned, they feel secure to wear and have plenty of spare accessories if I need a smaller or bigger fit. My phone supports reverse charging so I charged my buds on the back of my phone, very neat feature and worked well. I wish I bought these sooner they are a gamechanger!
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these headphones 100%. They are perfect when you want to get rid of the annoying headset thread, the sound is perfect, the volume is the same, in the ear they are perfect, in their box they are very safe in the sense that there is no possibility of losing them or somehow falling from there, the box housing is resistance, they are small, what you wear carries easily. The battery lasts about 6 to 8 hours depending on the volume you are listening to. They can also be charged via wifi. Castles come directly charged. For wireless charging can be kept directly in the box and put on the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with Samsung one ui
customer_reviews.text: Using this from 1 week and it is really better than my expectation. I am using this with Samsung galaxy note 9. Not sure how it works with other android phones Pros: 1. Comfortable. Have used 2 hrs straight many time without ear fatigue 2. Passive noise cancellation 3. Good sound quality for its size 4. Small and tiny to carry in pocket 5. Stable and reliable bluetooth connection with my Note 9 6. Handy touch controls 7. Battery life Cons: 1. Microphone for calls not so good 2. Touch controls can be fine tuned and more options for volume controls can be done 3. Unable to see cradle battery percentage in Samsung wear app
customer_reviews.author: Girish Nanjangud

customer_reviews.title: A great daily driver
customer_reviews.text: Pretty damn comfortable. Just what I needed as I have small ears and other ear buds usually hurt after awhile. The sound is pretty good. The touch sensitive gestures on the buds have really good responses unlike others that seem to take a few tries to trigger a response. The case is nice and small and the Bluetooth connectivity is solid. Overall, a really good daily driver and I am using this with the iPhone and it’s still worth the money in my opinion. With Samsung devices the extra features that accompanies the software makes this even better.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 7 months. Some stuttering and connection issues but overall pretty good. Recently, I went to pick one up whilst my hand was wet and it seemed to short out the left bud which no longer works despite leaving it in rice for several days. They really feel super brittle and are glossy/slippery so easy to drop (thankfully I never did not that it mattered much). Really feel like I've just thrown £100+ down the toilet on these. Decent headphones but so insanely delicate you have no margin for error with how you treat them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earphones
customer_reviews.text: Had read conflicting reviews regarding these earphones but can honestly say they are perfect. Sound is very clear and punchy with bass. They fit very snuggly, at least for me. Connection hasn't dropped at all - have been using for 4 days now. I have absolutely nothing negative to report. So if you were like me and unsure about buying I would 100 % recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rhoddi Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds, better price.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are great! Their charge lasts a long time, they’re discreet and easy to charge and I love the fact that they are compatible with wireless charging too. They’re a much better and cheaper alternative to the combative brands of wireless earbuds. They have a snug fit and are comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I take these with me everywhere incase I ever need to just zone out and listen to some music for a bit. The sound quality is great too, whilst I do not have an android device to sync these with (Apple user booo) the default settings are pretty nice!
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds !!
customer_reviews.text: Had a few TW ear buds that were just ok, these for me are by far the best good sound,nice fit and great touch control. Very light weight hardly notice I'm wearing them. Not the best for taking calls but will do if you need to. And the main plus is no lag or delay when watching media
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best all-round headphones
customer_reviews.text: Quite easily the best all-round headphones I've owned. I've tried a variety of headphones from Bose QC's to the Bose equivalent of the Buds. The Samsung Buds are fantastic whether I'm training on the Peloton bike or for general use. They stay firmly in your ears and the sound quality is really good. They work seamlessly with your Samsung phone and the app includes more settings than the Bose equivalent. Seriously if you're after a set of headphones that you can take to the gym or just for listening to audible or music give the buds a go!
customer_reviews.author: Nadeem Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Very average sound
customer_reviews.text: Seen some mixed reviews of these but decided to give them a go. Have to say my Jabra 65t's produce instantly recognisable better sound but they're more expensive so that's forgiven however disappointingly my £40 Chinese branded wireless earphones also offer clearly superior more dynamic sound than the Samsung buds and that can't be excused. I expected more from Samsung. Don't get me wrong the buds aren't terrible but the sound when directly comparing becomes apparent is very average. Can't comment on battery life. Positives: the touch controls are fine, buds are comfy in the ears, the charging case is compact and have a usbC type connector
customer_reviews.author: Scott landers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very good earphones. Bluetooth connection more or less constant depening on distance and location from device and clarity and noise reduction excellent. Very good battery life as well. Probably don't compare to very expensive earphones, but are decent enough and robust enough for folks like me who wouldn'y justify spending huge sums of money out on something that proportionately are fractionally only slightly better sound quality for a great deal more cost. Arrived very quickly as well. From my personal perspective a good purchase and am pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don' perform the update.
customer_reviews.text: The buds requested an update the moment they were connected. I dismissed this as some people said it had caused issues with the buds. Also I am disapointet that you can't have Bixby/Google assistant as well as having the volume controls. It is either one or the other. And the charging case only has enough power when fully charged to charge the buds once before having to be recharged again.
customer_reviews.author: thgun

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for starting out!
customer_reviews.text: Best earphones iv had ever, even better than my headphones! Fitment is perfect as long as you choose the right size tips and ear hooks that come with them. Sound wise there's plently of deep bass and crisp highs, the midst do lack a bit but not enough to make me unsatisfied! Havnt had any connection issues and not worried about battery life either as everytime I pop them back in the case they get charged back up again ready for the next time. Definitely recommend for anyone starting out with wireless earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of true wireless headphones which connected immediately with my s10+ and have worked seamlessly wver since. I use these headphones for my general personal music enjoyment, commutes, cycling and running. The sound quality is excellent battery life is excellent. They are light comfortable and unobtrusive. The charging case is small and works exceptionally well with the wireless or wired charging being super fast. Another great samsung product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great to listen to music but absolutely useless for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: At first i thought these was great , fantastic clear sound good bass , but used them twice and they are totally useless for phone calls , I can hear the people very clearly but they cannot hear me saying it's all muffled and cant understand me . At the price these are I expected more and think these will be returned
customer_reviews.author: john hodges

customer_reviews.title: amazing with my Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: so got these when very drunk. only on the fact they work well with samsung phone lol. anyway defntly not disappointed they work amazing with my s7 edge and unlike all bluetooth headphones iv had i have not had a pairing problem. just take out of case put them in. done. so small i can take them everywhere (suggest this as loosing the case is bad so treating thrm like keys are good lol)
customer_reviews.author: Justany

customer_reviews.title: Check the range between buds and device is of your expectation.
customer_reviews.text: I like samsung products so its 50/50 love for brand and product quality. I buy what I like and this item is within my expectation but not above so love it. For me it was the range between the buds and phone when playing football, not long enough range without carrying your phone with you. Very little point but this was why I got it. My fault for not checking the product range I guess. Still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Annor

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality poor otherwise decent all round.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to upgrade from Zolo Liberty Plus I got off kickstarter a couple years back which costed me about £70 at the time. However the galaxy buds sounded much worse than my Zolo buds and yet costed twice as much and had connectivity issues (dropping and interference sounds) so I returned them. However the Galaxy buds took the cake in all other areas: - Battery - Portability - Ease of use with my Note 8 (initial pairing to phone very similar to Airpods with iOS)
customer_reviews.author: Master S.

customer_reviews.title: Massive issue
customer_reviews.text: These were great and were my daily earphones till the left earbud for some reason stopped producing anywhere near enough volume. ( 50 % volume or less). I sent them to Samsung to fix them but said they were 'manufactured for sale outside of Europe.' so ' Unfortunately, we are unable to provide repair support for non- European devices' they said to contact amazon about the issue, but there is no way to except to leave a review! Long story short if your buds break you cannot get them fixed!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Italian only product sold in UK
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather knee-jerk review as only just received. All documentation is in Italian which is probably how the price is cheaper than the Samsung RRP. Couldn't pair straight out of the box - seems they're completely flat. Normally use over ear Sony noise cancelling headphones - hoped these would be easier to transport when travelling. Still haven't got them working so can't comment on sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Buys too much on Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Best to use with a Samsung device and not an apple device
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a very good product however it's best use is to connect with a Samsung device. I currently use an iPhone and its connection is quite poor and not as loud as when I connect with my Samsung tab. Also the call quality when I'm outside means people can't hear me. You also get the luxury of using an app to change settings while with iphone the app isn't available on the play store
customer_reviews.author: Khadija Kamara

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quality, Battery Fault and false advertising
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing and definitely comparable to the AKG ones you get out of the S10. There are 2 issues ive had with this purchase, the first being I was promised the £30 Samsung Cashback reward as it was advertised all over the product but was not eligible for the redemption as the seller was not directly Amazon. Secondly, the right earbud seems to lose its charge much quicker than the left one, dispite both being used at the same time. Overall I love the headphones but these issues havent left the best impression on the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Commuting Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a few months now and have to say I love them. I charge them when I remember and yet never seem to run out of battery whilst using them for several hours at a time. The noise cancellation is only what you get from having something block your ear canal, but otherwise the sound is great, telephone calls are made with ease. Just excellent and with no wires anymore, they are so convenient for my commute and for exercising!
customer_reviews.author: A Coleridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever had. Easy to use even on my Sony phone. Unfortunately alot of the function are unavailable but can download the companion app and the Samsung app the works with it and all functions can be used but the Bluetooth connection is instantaneous simply by taking them out the case and sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Simply brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds and easy to connect on the go. Have worked brilliantly over the passed few months. I use them every day and they haven't let me dont. The only thing I would wish is that they could be loader. But for most people I believe they will be load enough. Definitely keep the surrounding noise out Great and small to fit in suit or Jean's pockets easily. If they where lost I dont buy the same again instead of trying a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: H lew

customer_reviews.title: AVERAGE
customer_reviews.text: Saw a few youtube reviews so went ahead and placed an order. Sadly for me, they just did not work out. I can confirm they are super comfy, but ambient mode did not work for me with any phone I had including a Oneplus7pro. The volume was not super loud and bass was barely there. I am sure these will be great for many people, but for me, they had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Marty James

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, easy to use, highly compatible with s10
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I expected. Decent sound quality IF you work around in the sound settings in the accompanying galaxy app. You will need to turn the bass up or they will sound very tinny, but I got them to sound nice and I am pleased. Can’t compare to other stuff like apple etc, but I know decent sound and they sound decent. The fit can be uncomfortable but I found that her got better over time. Work perfectly with Samsung s10 and can’t comment on suitability of non Samsung stuff
customer_reviews.author: mick

customer_reviews.title: Work great with my Pixel 3a
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised by these buds. They pair instantly with my Pixel 3a and the sound quality is really good. I've had no connection or drop issues with these so far, and they fit really comfortably in my ears. Considering these are half the price of similar ear buds on the market, I think they are excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: asiarock

customer_reviews.title: Terrible after sales from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fed up with trying to get help with a problem with these buds. The stereo on one has failed and the Samsung shop reccomended getting in touch with Amazon about a replacement as it is 6mths since purchase. Trying to find an email address to do this is impossible, there is no customer after sales care and these buds were over £100. The Samsung telephone care phone line is not available. I would never buy an expensive item like this from Amazon again. Absolute disaster, I've spent hours searching the help pages and you go round in circles , it is an absolutely awful UX and way to offer a service
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Small, fitting and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed by the sound quality and battery life of these earphones. As soon as I unpackaged them they immediately connected to my phone and have given an uninterrupted connection since then with excellent battery life. Overall I continue to be impressed by the galaxy buds every time I use them and i believe they are well worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection stability
customer_reviews.text: The buds feel premium, the features are great, sound quality is good, they're comfortable and the connection has a long reach and battery life is above average .... So why the 3 stars? The connection is not good on my Huawei phone... Keeps being affected by interference at certain locations like a busy train platform or a road junction between buildings.... No idea why this is happening but it ruins the buds for me... If I had my chance again I'd have purchased an alternative product
customer_reviews.author: Darren D

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good and they are quite comfortable to wear - I have quite small ears so after an hour or so the wings on them get slightly uncomfortable but they are easily adjusted a little to ease the pressure. My only complaint would be that even when my phone is in my back pocket the sound sometimes cuts for a moment every so often. Works much better if you're sat down with your phone in front of you. That said I love these and wouldn't be without them now. Battery life is great too.
customer_reviews.author: cheergal101

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds (provided they work).
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of these roughly a month ago. Sound quality is slightly worse than my Sennheiser HD4.40, but it's negligible, considering the size of these. Now whether or not these will work is a hit and miss. My right bud stopped working (whether or not that was due to a firmware update or hardware fault I'm not certain). I did some reddit and samsung forums digging and it looks like this is a very common issue for the Earbuds. (low volume in one bud after a while). Can't say gambling for a good experience is worth it (for this price tag at least).
customer_reviews.author: Vladislavs Manannikovs

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Very Impressive piece of kit , love the sound and ease of use , the noise cancellation is great but also has a feature that amplifies ambient sound which works well but is weird , was using the buds to call hands free whilst it was raining and the sound was amplified and the other half could hear it too but also every word perfect
customer_reviews.author: lukey2k

customer_reviews.title: If you lose them they are gone.
customer_reviews.text: The earbud are good but if they fall out your pocket or you leave them behind their is no way of locating them sadly I learnt the hard way after only having them for about a month. The only way to relocate them is to play high pitch sounds through the tiny earphone speaker.
customer_reviews.author: sarah lacey

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, I can have these in for hours and don't even feel them; they are so lightweight. The sound isolation is 10/10 for these little buds so I can always enjoy my music. The sound quality is pretty solid for what they are as well, obviously is isn't super high quality but for a pair of wireless buds this size its impressive. I recommend using the Dynamic mode in the app for the best sound performance as it changes depending on your surroundings etc. I use these buds everyday and couldn't live without them now, good job Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Porter

customer_reviews.title: Very good mid range product.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptic about them before buying but now changed my mind completely. 3 hour battery life and another 3 after recharging with the case, very good sound quality with clear base (phone call sound a bit muffled on the other end) and good noise cancelling. They are easy to control though I would add a bit more options. Bluetooth connection with Samsung phone very stable in normal circumstances (buds don't like to be apart from each other, then a bit iffy).
customer_reviews.author: Jacek

customer_reviews.title: Great product, must buy for any samsung user
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation was great and they are extremely comfy. The sound is great but not excellent, can't fault it for an average user. Only problems as of yet us the connection will flicker for a second but this hasn't happened much as of yet. Connecting them to my Galaxy A5 2017 was simple and easy and the case is compact. They are a perfect size and are descrite in the ear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent (AKG) sound - but no good for little ladies ears
customer_reviews.text: The sound is superb and battery life is brilliant - but it's all wasted when the actual earbud is too big for my lady's diminutive ears..! In a nutshell (or seashell, as we're reviewing audio kit here), these are great for blokes and ladies with larger lugholes - but not so good for smaller sized listenin' apertures...
customer_reviews.author: Autolycus

customer_reviews.title: Faulty or very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed had to send my back as there where major connection issues design great and in ear fit was very good but sound very bad and connection it was beyond one side would work othe wont kept skipping tracks without me even touching my phone or buds and I got note 10+ 5g
customer_reviews.author: igors androsiks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent integration with Samsung Galaxy S9
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these buds with a Samsung Galaxy S9 and they integrate together seamlessly. As soon as I open the case, the buds pair up immediately with the phone without me tinkering with the bluetooth settings. Sound quality is excellent for small ear buds but the noise cancellation is not as good as my Sony MDR-XB950N1.
customer_reviews.author: Japes

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: So, I would say that these are brilliant ear buds. Great size with a nice, portable case which fits nicely in any pocket. Sound quality is superb and the battery is very good! The only issue I currently have after using them for a month is the left ear has stopped working properly. Everytime I try and use it the sound constantly cuts in and out. I have to physically hold my hand against the earbud to get constant sound.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good...for a while.
customer_reviews.text: In terms of the actual product, it's great! I've ran into no issues. Connectivity is fast and easy, earphones last as long as advertised and the charging is quick and painless. My issue with these may be a general problem, or I'm just unlucky. I've owned 2 pairs of these and on both sets the left earbud just becomes almost silent. For some reason, it just happens. Even when the volume is fully turned up youll struggle to hear it. But obviously, this is a huge con as I'd steer away from this product for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cole

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Quality
customer_reviews.text: Total game changer, these are astounding. Up until now, I have been lugging around a pair of wireless Sennheiser over-ear headphones. These are almost on par with the sound quality. Not quite perfect on the noise cancellation. But for a first generation product, Samsung have come a long way very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great buds 1 major flaw
customer_reviews.text: Very good buds, great sound great noise cancellation and great look. Problem I had (on 2 sets!) Was that they didn't hold a charge in the case. Once put back in the case the battery of the case would drain. It would be about 3-4 days of unused power that drained away and needed recharging. Big shame really. These had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Tech.
customer_reviews.text: Great little pieces of tech, the only features that are missing are noise cancellation and be able to customize the buttons to do more with the device, I.e. being able to skip tracks and adjust the volume without the use of my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mahbz

customer_reviews.title: Now hear this - now hear this
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable to wear, easy to use and the sound quality is good. I do like the re-charge facility given by the pod they are stored in so that total battery life before plugging into a charger is pretty much all day
customer_reviews.author: philgo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Black
customer_reviews.text: These just work i like them, the sound that they make sounds good to me, every ones ears are diffrent so you may have a differant experince. One thing that i found was that the large ear buds were not big enough for my ears i had to buy 3rd party ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: liskmarth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like these, they do what they should. Battery life is good , I only use them while commuting on train or when on lunch. My daughter has the iPhone earphones which look like little horns sticking out and if she drops one she has to look for it, if I drop one of these I can go on the app and get to to make a loud noise to help you find it
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the value compared to other brands!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the IPhone brand I purchased for my daughter; these are a bit fiddly to handle and insert. Wasn't impressed with the Samsung cash back offer Amazon was promoting. If tempted, fully read the offer before purchasing as some suppliers do not qualify, (a bit of false advertising I feel!)
customer_reviews.author: VGP

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less the 2 months - BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much everything about them was great until the right bud went to no volume so I went to the Samsung store and they said that it was because they were an Eatern/Asian version of the buds and were unable to fix it. The product was purchase via the UK Amazon Samsung store so product should have been suitable for UK use. Really quite upset about this as I cannot afford to replace these and the store said if they were the UK version they would have replaced the buds for free.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions in English
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with instructions in Italian only, which unfortunately we cannot understand. The user then tried to pair the buds with his Galaxy phone, which led to the user interface disappearing from phone, rendering phone unusable.
customer_reviews.author: izizou

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas - sound quality is awful - to get any decent sound you have to hold them pressed in your ears - tried all different ear buds included - son more impressed with my airbuds
customer_reviews.author: Suze72

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, nice design - Poor Sound
customer_reviews.text: I loved these buds as soon as I put them in, they are the most comfortable earphones I have experienced. I use them for walking and running and they are easily secure enough for both activities. However, when using with my Galaxy S8 phone the buds are very quiet, even at full volume (even after the volume warning has been over-ridden). The left bud occasionally goes very quiet and needs to be reset. All in all pretty disappointing despite the great fit and excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mustardo

customer_reviews.title: DISGRACE
customer_reviews.text: Broken. Constant beeping in one bud seems to be a hardware issue. Samsung clueless. Checked online and many have this problem. Absolute disgrace of a product. Never buying samsung again.
customer_reviews.author: Ray C.

customer_reviews.title: The best in-ear and wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have used multiple wireless headphones and these are by far my favourites, they look minimal and provide an excellent battery life with the addition of a charging case and for wireless in ear buds they have a great sound quality and decent noise cancellation. The ability for them to record your surroundings and amplify them for you is also a fantastic addition when trying to have a conversation or walk through an urban area without taking them out.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but very good
customer_reviews.text: Right serious review time.... Goods- easy connect, good tech, look great, nice charging box, comfortable and stay in Bad- no really bad points although they are not the loudest I ve had hence the dropped star.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun is not a sheep :)

customer_reviews.title: A legit Samsung product but NOT MANUFACTURED IN THE UK
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a year ago and as bluetooth earphones go, I really like them! But I recently had one of the buds stop working and when I contacted Samsung they confirmed that these were a legit Samsung product but were not manufactured in the UK. Therefore, they were unable to help me with the issue. Luckily, Amazon's amazing customer service team allowed me to send these back for a refund and I will not be repurchasing them from the official Samsung site. I'm really disappointed that these details were not made clear to me, so just watch out!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of earbuds I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have spend a fortune on different earbuds usually they fall out of my ears.these are the 1st pair I've bought that dont.easy to pair with my phone.excellent sound quality.battery life is really good and the little charging box is really good for when out and about
customer_reviews.author: Lisa marie woods

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect faulty goods to be replaced/refunded. Scam.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap. Been using for about 3 weeks, and are excellent when they work. Unfortunately, the right one keeps screeching a static noise down my ear and won't work, whilst the left just continues to disconnect. Refuse to provide a return address.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie wood

customer_reviews.title: Suffers from a lot of interferance.
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are execellent, noise cancellation, battery life and sound quality are very good. However they really do suffer with inteference. I keep my phone in my pants pocket and I find if I cover my pocket with my hand the audio starts to drop out/skip. Also when in crowds I find they do the same. I was in Euston station recently and the interference was very bad. I previously had the Samsung Level U headphones and they were even worse for interference.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S Corkhill

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but has a few minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the galaxy buds for just over a year now. The best thing about them was the passive noise cancellation, but the ambient sound made it hard to hear people when they were talking to you, I found taking them out was quicker and easier which made it pointless. Sound quality is amazing one of the best in this area. Recently my case has been decreasing in battery capacity so I have just sent mine back. I reccomend getting the buds+ for £20 or so extra, alot of problems have been addressed and is better value. But if you can't get buds+, these original buds are still great!
customer_reviews.author: Archie Coveney

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud let's out high pitch whine. Does
customer_reviews.text: The right earbus broke in a week and started a high pitch whine in my ear. Will not stop even when disconnected from bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: My first every review
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but felt compelled after using the buds. Sound quality is pretty great as they fit right into one's ears. When it comes to convenience, they're probably the best pair of headphones I have owned. They are pretty comfortable too and come with different sized rubber grips. I am content with the battery and only charge it once every 3 days but that's because I use them for about 3-5 hours everyday - charges up relatively quickly. Noise cancellation is not exceptional, but then again they are IN-EAR tiny headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Hamidi

customer_reviews.title: Tiny buds with tiny sound
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews I thought that these were gong to be a great replacement for two failed pairs of Jabra Elite Sports...unfortunately not, the fit while running isn't as great as made out and the sound is pretty average.
customer_reviews.author: Jon English

customer_reviews.title: Overall Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall the quality is good. The only problem with these earbuds is its microphones as conversing on the phone is impossible due to the fact it picks not only my voice but all the noise around. Therefore creating a huge issue for the person at the other end.
customer_reviews.author: Kaan Yerebasmaz

customer_reviews.title: Left Bud stopped working after 4 days
customer_reviews.text: Had issues from day one now the good thing about poor quality products made by a household name such as Samsung is their customer service now I was offered an exchange but I think I will stay clear of Samsung and Amazon as not what they both make out I will spend a little more and buy “Jabra” seems the best option to replace a dying brand.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as was fed up with over ear headphones foam getting soaked at the gym - that pair also dropped out too much. These have never dropped connection, sound is great battery life amazing. Very occasionally one can work loose at the gym but that's all down to ear size and shape. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: W. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product could be better noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy buds have many positives to them. Firstly, the sound quality is extremely good and it makes it easy to enjoy music compared to other earphones. The volume control is also really simple and this product follows voice command by using Google Assistant so you can perform tasks without even touching your phone. The noise cancellation is okay but it could be better since you can still hear a lot of surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smashin buds, exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 pairs in the house, a Polish set going by the language on the box a pair from Samsung UK, and now these which which have the same product codes as mine from Samsung all work perfectly and exactly the same quality and sound, do not hesitate to buy, I wish I'd saved myself £20+ and bought from here.
customer_reviews.author: Pol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Samsung S10
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed... you should keep the wearable app and the Buds updated all the time. Sometimes going crazy but switch on and off will help. I am working with freezer unit so this bugger is on even if I do not listen music or talking.
customer_reviews.author: Laszlo

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love these little guys. So easy to set up, especially if you have a Samsung phone. I was really surprised by the sound quality, given how small they are. Going from my old Bose over ears, can't say there's too much difference. Slight downside if the right bud sometimes feels like it's falling out, thats probably the shape of my ear tho. Battery is ok. However, having two charges in the case keeps them going for the day. All round, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brustad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and firm fit for the ears
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds stay firmly in my ear with no worries about it falling out and yet really comfortable. Sound reproduction is good and meets my needs. The ability to have ambient sound fed into the bud is a neat trick, but I don't use it regularly. Happy with wireless charging capability as well. Makes a perfect match with a Samsung phone
customer_reviews.author: Darren P

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I thought they would be
customer_reviews.text: I have used airpods and knew their downsides so I had some reservations when ordering there but they were significantly better than I thought they would be. The audio quality obviously won't beat wired headphones of the same price but for how small they are it is amazing (make sure you use bass boost in the wearables app it makes it much better) and thanks to them being wider and sealing the ear the noise cancellation is much better than airpods.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: I recommend them to anybody
customer_reviews.text: They are really and truly amazing. I never knew how useful and how much I needed them until I got them. The sound is amazing and so is the bass. I'm a bass head and no amount of bass will ever truly satisfy me, but these are good enought for a day to day use and they are do effortless you just put them on and done, by the time you have put them in your ears they have been paired with your phone and they are just waiting on you. But every product has its flaws and this one is that it needs a bit better connectivity cause sometimes they stutter
customer_reviews.author: Afonso

customer_reviews.title: Conveniance and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: When purchasing these ear buds you have to understand first that truly wireless earbuds are meant for convenience. And on that front the galaxy buds are excellent, from the fast bud to phone connection time to the wirelessly charging case. Samsung have really made a great product here, as not only are they convenient but also great quality. They are lacking on the bass side of things but you still get crisp clear audio with zero stuttering. I would recommend purchasing a set of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones but...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great, and my wife really likes them and their quality. However when we purchased them it had a 30 pound cashback sticker on the listing, that samsung wouldnt honour as it was purchased on amazon... bit of a scam there, but otherwise headphones are great and you dont look too odd with them in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Broken from receiving
customer_reviews.text: Buds making a hammer drill type noise, Samsung have repaired them twice and they think it may be from their origin (I.e. seller) advised to buy from Samsung store next time which is very useful to me now
customer_reviews.author: Martin D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound balance.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sound balance, responds with authority when using graphic equalizer to increase bass mid or treble to desired levels. Ambient sound function could be better by significantly amplifying ambient sounds PAST what the in app option allows.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung Product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but don't quite fit the differing ear covers you get, prefer the old style in-ear earphones but nice, pairing with my S9+ was easy using the wearable app, charges easily is you have a charging pad, if QI compatible,also contains a battery to top up charge when not near power
customer_reviews.author: MarkS23

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt be without them
customer_reviews.text: Nouse cancelling is really good. Holds well in your ears. However if you have small ear canal these may be uncomfortable. I have worn these for hours on the train no issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds, White - UK Version
product_meta.description: Colour Name:White| Style Name:UK Version| Pattern Name:BudsSamsung Galaxy buds - White.
feature_bullets: Samsung Galaxy buds: from podcasts on your commute, to playlists in the gym, with its wireless design, you can take your audio with you anywhere
Easily sync the Galaxy buds to your smartphone, connect to your smartwatch or link them to your tablets (Bluetooth connectivity required)
Crisp, clear and detailed, the Galaxy buds deliver stunning, sound by AKG
When you want to hear the world around you, ambient Mode works with a simple tap
Unbeatable design: The comfortable Galaxy buds are soft yet strong, they form perfectly to the shape of your ear
Choose a colour to suit your style and easily slip their charging case into your pocket or bag

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
